title: The Power of Loving BIG in Small Moments
itunes:author: Guest: Eryn Lynum
itunes:summary: Enjoying the small moments with your children can create special memories. John and Danny offer hope to exhausted parents struggling to enjoy the simple moments of parenting. Receive the book 936 Pennies with your gift of any amount!
